## i2cWriteBlockData() function

This writes up to 32 bytes to the specified register of the device.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function i2cWriteBlockData(handle: number, i2cReg: number, data: Uint8Array): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  handle | number | The I2C device handle as returned by [i2cOpen()](./lgpio.i2copen.md) |
|  i2cReg | number | 0-0xFF, the register to write |
|  data | Uint8Array | The buffer containing the data to write |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
